reviews.review_msg: Pabel is a good prof, despite the comments below.  If you want to take a class where you will be challenged then he's your guy. Lectures+Tutorials are interesting if your willing to do the readings and be involved.He is a hard marker but his courses are worth taking even if your GPA does take a hit.

DO NOT TAKE A CLASS WITH THIS MAN! His grading is not based on the work, way to much reading, has favourites, makes fun of people when they go to him for help (He actually laughed at me when I went to him with a question!)
